meta.title: Adventure: Jake From StateFarm vs The Aliens

scenes.text: You’re alone at your parents’ house. Homework’s done; research paper can wait. A warmonger alien kicks in the door and declares your home his base of operations. What do you do?
Smash cut: the hospital. Nearly every bone feels broken. A hooded man wheels your bed and murmurs, “This one is protected by StateFarm.” Staff recoil.
Hundreds of you flood the streets—imposters trying to replace you. The hooded man asks you to trust his protection.
He throws back the hood—JAKE FROM STATEFARM. With a single gust, he scatters the entire imposter horde. You’re safe—for now.
You bolt into an alley. Five imposters corner you. It doesn’t end well.
A giant, very professional wasp wheels in and itemizes your bill—payable in money or blood. The hooded man offers help.
You offer an arm. Three seconds later you’re a crisp, decorative husk.
The hood flies off again—JAKE FROM STATEFARM. He grabs the wasp and politely ejects her through a door. You and Jake fight the remaining bugs side-by-side.
Your call sparks a CAT-5 brawl that levels the block. You speed away, unsure who to call. An alien sniper blows a tire.

choices.label: Call the emergency number Mom gave you

scenes.text: Jake Gyllenhaal picks up. The car sails off a cliff… straight into the underworld.
Because Mom signed you up for life insurance, JAKE FROM STATEFARM appears, spreads wings, and lifts you back to life.
You refuse the offered hand. The demons appreciate your commitment.
The right Jake falls from the sky and stops your car with one hand. He asks you to stay behind him while he deals with the aliens.
A tractor beam lifts the car. You learn new meanings of “out-of-network.”
With a single punch, Jake deletes the city-wide mothership. The invasion ends. Your home reappears good as new.
